title: Password-Generator
text: This is a password generator app which prompts user for their choice and generates password taking thier answers.

title: Coding Quiz
text: An app based on Quiz questions with multiple choice questions and stores the highscores to the local storage.

title: Team Profile Generator
text: This was a password generator based on prompts

title: Plan & Go
text: A travell planner app which allows user to check for the weather, map and latest news for a searched city.

title: Weather-Dashbord
text: A front-end web application that enables a user to check for current weather and 5-day forecast for any searched city.

title: Work Day Scheduler
text: A calender app which allows a user to make a schedule for a day between 9am to 5pm.
